cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7a5e9911-a3af-4f7a-bcda-344b4bc71bc6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我个人的成长史"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98e461d9-e556-4abb-8cd4-826d8b692fc9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我从小就是在农村长大的孩子，家里并不富裕。但我认为我的家庭给了我最好的成长环境。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e075579-fb41-424a-b24d-1e53a13ce196"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ccab9581-0997-4ea8-a0f7-ea3cca6b6084","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成长环境"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"caa09500-81ca-4a06-ba91-0075bfff2a62"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我爷爷曾是一名小学老师，据他的所有学生说，他都很严厉。我爷爷可以让他的学生闻风丧胆，甚至可以拿着教鞭追着学生到家里。我想如果我爷爷在这个时代教书应该不会有那么多家长和学生理解他。但很奇怪的是他的学生对他的评价都很高。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68e459bb-0424-46d2-a952-89cd59f31c59"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12be51f9-d213-4b25-8874-22e219c9afaf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我父母都是农民，他俩是非常勤奋的菜农。我爸妈从小就做过很多生意，卖过大米、卖过蔬菜瓜果，反正就是特别能折腾，做过很多小生意。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e384e317-9211-4399-9e7e-6c7715d13e4a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50f15ecc-f605-417f-adf5-3d7d851be7d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我有一个比我长两岁的姐姐，姐姐对我是非常爱护，虽然偶尔跟她吵架。但更多时候她总是让着我，姐姐平时帮助我很多。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0559d37a-4317-4081-bbc9-2aefce626674"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"875d74bc-f4c3-4e18-9d65-2b269b4b5485","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习之路"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbbc4603-6f40-480f-8922-14b245eb7bfa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我小学不爱学习，直到四年级时数学测试打了一次零分，我妈妈知道我的学习这么烂后，每到放学在家里给我搞了一个小黑板补习，我五年级的学习才开始自驱走上了正轨。但是直到现在我的乘除法还是很烂，甚至乘法口诀都还不是很熟悉。不知是上天的眷顾还是什么，幸好五年级才开始学方程。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23a0e658-147b-488f-9b9d-86e48c56a1e6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0db1498c-09a4-4691-8b06-bd101eefbe8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的人生经历告诉我，其实乘除法不熟练并不影响后续的学习。大脑的算力其实很富裕，都能轻松应付这些，而真正重要的是函数、是算法。当你不知道如何解决问题的时候，即便给你一台计算机你还是解不出来。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22c4690e-b3ca-4044-a269-389b6abeffe7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff60c315-a58d-4a11-a86d-9761d5e6574f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小学的学习生活，除了上课非常无聊外，下课放学是我最快乐的时候，那个时候我折腾各种东西，大概就是拆坏修不好的那种。所以，我最怕我爸爸发现了我又把什么搞坏了。我印象最深刻的就是我小时候把他俩结婚的录音机给拆了，原因是我想要录音机里的喇叭，里面有磁铁，我想制作一个冰嘎（一种类似陀螺的东西）。因为磁铁可以吸引别的冰嘎，这样会非常有趣。还有我经常喜欢去园子里玩，去种点什么，挖点什么，玩水（主要是利用水的虹吸效应，虽然那时我不知道什么是虹吸效应）。我还特别喜欢去小沟子（小溪）里玩，有各种蝌蚪、青蛙、泥鳅、蜗牛之类的。我喜欢养他们，虽然最后都养死了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0319a0c7-c902-41c8-9f2d-985cf0bfd170"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5143d02e-8166-4503-9ff9-86a30324f259"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，我小的时候就是生活在自己的世界里。我喜欢鼓捣折腾各种我喜欢的东西，虽然现在看来，那贫瘠的生活环境里并没有什么新奇的东西。但对于小孩子世界观的形成，我觉得接触自然是一个非常好的基础。就像《枪炮、病菌与钢铁》中所写到的「童年的刺激和活动有助于心智发展」，在童年的自由探索中，我激发了很多足以让我一生受益的兴趣和习惯。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2a53564-b460-4646-addc-aed3767a8c93"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff48f5f7-c70e-4172-b21e-66bfa9e3c739"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初中开始，我开始把生活的重心放到了学习上。我父母觉得我的基础并不好所以让我蹲级（降级的意思）了。本来我就是一个不是很喜欢交朋友的人，但是蹲级让我几乎没有了什么朋友。不知道为什么那个年龄觉得差一岁都觉得差好多。但是命运就让我这么开始了我的初中学习生涯。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e601d8a1-d24b-4938-b47f-df75ac33cfce"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5437fa36-95c3-4aa0-82c4-0b2d1e4d9cad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初中我的学习策略就是题海战术，所以屡试不爽。毕竟初中的题花样就那么多。初中我很刻苦学习，几乎是每天凌晨睡，早早就起来背书了。所以我如愿以偿的考上了我们县城里的重点高中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2b33319-261b-4c1d-a3a2-073aa1ed8757"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17712364-9fc0-4d2d-9338-10494d9b0c3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高中的生活，现在想想都很窒息。我的题海战术不奏效了，高一我的成绩还算不错，能稳定在班级前10 ，因为我文科擅长的原因，我几乎都是靠着文科再拉升排名（虽然我很少花精力学习文科）。但高二我还是选择了理科班，所以分文理后，我就开始班级倒数。压力很大，我脸上长了很多青春痘。巨大的落差，让我变得很自卑。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbb97bac-4349-4fa7-bf61-13f386ebd197"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15616115-d89d-40e3-a43a-2104e26f5bca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在想想非常搞笑，明明命运给了我一条出路，一种天赋，但就是这么硬生生的被我随波逐流的选择给错过了。之所以没有选择文科是我姐说文科没有发展，还有我们的高中学校是以理科见长，在我们高中选择文科从某种程度上意味着你是不行的那种学生，加上我还不喜欢政治喜欢物理。其实我姐说的没错，我不喜欢政治也是事实。但我并没有权衡利弊结合自身情况独立思考，独立判断。一种近乎人云亦云的抉择，让我错过了我的天命。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25728515-6d34-4f57-adf9-cd8864094a45"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d5d3d74-5125-4f9b-bdf3-f0a3d08ac814"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大学我读的是一所 211 大学的工科类专业，一个我不喜欢的专业，所以我大学开始搞互联网，开始从事运营做自媒体搞产品。机缘巧合，造化弄人，做产品搞运营，成了我现在谋生的事业。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf5fceae-8cb7-48a8-862b-e89118141663"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8c03c596-fad9-46f2-bf48-b147912be4f0","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"职业生涯"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f20ee494-35da-444e-9350-fc1f6adf6574"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后来，我做了很多产品，也做了很多自媒体，有的大家或许会知道，有的大家或许不了解。但是那些过往标签对我现在来说都似乎不那么重要了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2fe2a00c-b96c-4836-8d74-e0afb419c8af"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89c59476-ab48-4576-9d49-3aad009bcef3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我还是喜欢自由多一点，我不喜欢在大厂当螺丝钉。我不喜欢当别人的工具，我不擅长搞人际关系，我讨厌办公室政治。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf8b89dd-da39-4175-8c26-9e6423072b50"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"086cae51-e02f-44dc-8991-a0d4341f07a5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以，我很喜欢自己搞项目和产品，我不会觉得有孤独感。我还是和小的时候一样，喜欢鼓捣自己想做的东西，并把大量精力付诸于此。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9346f6ed-82ad-46f9-8bcd-3f2c3fd136e2"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0992e5f4-9c86-4e1c-9609-8e568f1475ab","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一点感想"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8a56d38-efdb-4fe9-9f00-deb680f6ea77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我曾经是一个没有什么理想和志向的坏孩子，后来我努力成为别人眼中优秀的好孩子。但是造化弄人，我曾经以为我获得的这一切都是凭借我自己的努力，可是渐渐意识到自我的命运是和时代是和自己的天赋有绝大关系的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2be0371-d839-494b-a47b-57f856d9bfcb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb0be10e-123b-4d52-965d-1067652f15da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们没有人能真正的改变历史，能改变历史的只有趋势。我们只是这趋势的一部分，所以我认为顺势而为很重要。我不是一个很会投机的人，虽然我觉得现代社会想要获得世俗意义上的成功必须要学会功利化的「投机」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e5a6bba-a571-4b7f-91f2-a4c2b1db4f0a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c36eead-c5de-4d11-8b06-b14af298c2aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我也不知道接下来，命运之船会让我飘向哪里。但是我能做的就是掌好我能掌好的手中之舵。至于这个世界的社会的风云变化，不是我能决定的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79d6e51b-cbf2-47d2-bcaa-232b8f7fbe44"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1f7a6be-0cd3-4f95-b641-963da4b701a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，我希望我未来面对命运的安排能豁达一些。既然个人决定的有限，那就别有那么多的执着。很多人都说我是一个理想主义者，但是境遇也让我越来越信奉马基雅维利了，甚至也渐渐对现代「政治学」产生了些许兴趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"409e4da5-170a-4318-a6ea-e20730a58b85"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ce0e7a3-e4fa-4008-ad30-47c3a12fce68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"倒不是我想开了，而是我觉得有理想并不能改变什么，必须要深刻理解这个世界的运行的道理，然后按照这个道理去做我们能做的事，该做的事。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2fca945-d2c9-48c6-9b2a-e575f83bd058"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f0672a5-cacb-4f4a-abe7-750301bb86d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近在读《资治通鉴》有一个深切的感受就是，虽然每一个有教养的读书人都有服务于公众而牺牲自我的精神，但无数历史人物和历史瞬间都证明这种精神的实际作用收效甚微。诸如孔丘、孟轲，他们也都没有被同时代所承认，甚至后来被需要也只是被统治需要。就像叔孙通给刘邦的建议所言，夫儒者难与进取，可与守成。没有人真正关心孔孟的理想，孔孟之道只是手段而已。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a26f21a-cb8e-4c82-95d1-cce7cc593c45"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fdec673-1382-48ad-9ced-7bb943032a55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我不想冒天下之大不韪去抨击这个世界就是个巨大的草台班子，每个人都有每个人的自由，我不想改变别人。我还是相信康德的那句「Man is an end in himself, not a means to an end」，我现在只想做一些让我开心的事，至于别人的困苦，我不敢再去关心，或许我也不该去关心。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18feb9c7-8d92-44ca-9761-831e95650075"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4383cf54-8675-454d-9a3a-c5f960eb211e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但如果愿望能成真，我还是想人们都过的好一点。但现实告诉我，这个想法太幼稚了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6c516cd-bc85-4d05-b163-084dd7f430f6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3994a8a-650c-4e94-bb49-91475d56f00c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以，惟愿世界和平。"}]}]}
cards.title: 我个人的成长史

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d8bdecec-4173-42d1-9ba3-cf9e0e5b7f2b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"左翼"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32693c20-fe08-454f-8459-35a3b14b2210"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"左翼，又称左派，主要是指支持平等原则和平等主义的政治意识形态。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95a7ac2c-8efd-48a2-963f-769e381e0e6b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f73ae530-0236-4513-806f-86532544942d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"左翼的支持者多认为社会存在不合理的不公平，且这类现象需要被减少或消除。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28aef9a4-b9a5-4ad0-a61e-05a996b9279b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b00b1f76-20d1-4f4e-b254-b1a51bf7e45a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"左翼通常与捍卫阶级和传统的右翼相对。 左翼亦指进步主义，与反动和保守势力持相反政治取向。"}]}]}
cards.title: 左翼

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"51522576-27e9-488f-ab11-8caf3a083d4c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"鸽派"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8841ec9-a76c-4443-9ddc-b93f226e56f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"鸽派，一个广泛用于政治上的名词，指主张采取柔性温和或怀柔的态度及手段处理外交、军事等问题的人士、团体或势力以维护国家、民族利益。反义词为鹰派。 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8acb7f6d-a627-48c1-b75a-053ea1ab1e8e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96dcee78-86f9-4729-b256-a79873c111ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"采用白鸽来形容的原因是：在圣经的诺亚方舟故事中，白鸽象征着和平。"}]}]}
cards.title: 鸽派

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5519d47d-cffd-4213-8d81-7b16eab2268a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"亚里士多德主义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56bc22b5-80d6-46e8-8402-6e196b96e818"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"又称亚里士多德学派，强调智慧和美德的实践（包括节制）。"}]}]}
cards.title: 亚里士多德主义

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"172ec845-1352-46d2-b436-9adc0820b9a8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"极简主义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bf14082-6c6a-4095-8918-9533825be68e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"极简主义"},{"type":"text","text":"（英语：Minimalism），是指消费观念及对于物品的取舍之价值观。其最核心的主张便是“less is more”，旨在于丢弃和删减对于生活中不重要、替代性高、不真正喜欢的物品（less），来获得对于生活上、视觉上、居住空间上的拓展、减少不必要及冲动消费额外多出的钱、获得心灵上的平静及思考的空间（more）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc88b8c2-78da-4fcc-9bd5-266c244ecbae"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4678ec9a-9ae5-47b2-99cc-e3d306646ed9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"极简主义者（minimalism）通常表现对于物质的高度自治，能觉察生活中被强行赋予价值的物质并避免购买劣质品，转而透过买少、买好、用久的理念，减少快时尚及劣质品对于环境及自身的伤害。当人们拥有更少的东西时，他们可以更容易地保持清晰的思维，更容易专注于重要的事情。同时，减少物品和活动意味者避免时间和金钱的浪费，有助于把人生最重要两项资源集中在最需要的地方。"}]}]}
cards.title: 极简主义

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8fe4c36e-2cc5-4179-92a9-8bc8dc66f165","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存在主义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28013b1b-5068-4df8-8c37-b54d5f5cfd10"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存在主义者是指信奉存在主义的哲学思想的人。存在主义是20世纪的一种哲学流派，它关注个体的存在、自由、选择、孤独和人的存在状态。存在主义者认为人的存在是先于本质的，每个人都必须为自己的生活和选择负责。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cc9323b-db22-4395-871a-47bdc44289a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存在主义者通常对传统的道德、宗教和社会规范持怀疑态度，他们认为人应该自由地选择自己的价值观和生活方式，而不是受到外部规则或权威的束缚。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5d0214a-d72b-4e82-b4d6-6b8e02ea89c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"著名的存在主义者包括让·保罗·萨特（Jean Paul Sartre）、阿尔贝·加缪（Albert Camus）、马丁·海德格尔（Martin Heidegger）等。他们的作品深入探讨了人的存在问题，对20世纪的文学、哲学和文化产生了深远的影响。"}]}]}
cards.title: 存在主义

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"49f619e2-9892-4ff5-ac81-8b77b6a8497f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Jopus"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"167a5978-3307-4cf8-bd1f-600441e1a459"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我之所以叫这个名字是 J+Opus , 我姓氏的首字母是 J ，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/af6584fa-c535-4ad5-9e49-e88ff6f4102d","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Opus"},{"type":"text","text":" 是有“作品”的意思。所以当初给自己博客注册域名的时候就起了这个名字，然后我自己就非常喜欢。"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"所以 Jopus 就是我的作品的意思。"}]}]}
cards.title: Jopus

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5c461e49-09f0-42a6-aa9c-6728f15eb7cb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Opus"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ac12397-1903-4663-85f6-cac12c29f97f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\"Opus\" 是拉丁语，意思是“作品”或“作品集”。在艺术、音乐和文学领域，这个词经常用来指代一个艺术家、作曲家或作家的重要作品或全部作品。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8482d415-7656-49e4-ae84-15f4f785a7b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如，在音乐领域，作曲家的某个作品可能会被标记为“Op. 1”（作品1），而“Op.”后面的数字则代表了该作曲家的作品编号。同样，在文学或艺术领域，一个艺术家的某个作品或作品集也可能被称为其\"opus\"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"630113fb-79f2-49c3-bec5-7f305f137919"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，\"opus\"是一个表示艺术家或创作者作品的术语。"}]}]}
cards.title: Opus

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ec4e5082-81ce-40ff-be7f-935357628991","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公开笔记"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c03e4208-2028-42ed-a5cc-eef76626c87a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是一种”"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"将笔记作为产品来管理“"},{"type":"text","text":"（notes-management as a product）的理念，把自己的笔记文档作为产品能够加深自我认知，促成敏捷的思考，更能打破信息不透明，有利于他人了解，更有利于复利。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"741757b8-b5f5-4c0f-b277-31c01b29add5"}}]}
cards.title: 公开笔记

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7aeaf507-28bd-4053-af24-4a247288a64a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么做个人笔记？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ca0c218-82e9-467e-826c-e733739b2d35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个笔记是我和这个世界的交流方式，写文档也是一个梳理自己的过程。我认为个人应该尽量多的把经验或思考都落实到文字上存档起来。人生短暂，总不应该花太多的时间在迷茫上，写作是个逻辑思考的过程，通过写成文档更能方便他人查阅。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d192d70-40ff-4b34-afbc-c52b4cd7a6fc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dccb8436-29f4-4b46-9ef1-a6f577a95d80"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"这个是为我自己书写，更是为了每一个想了解我的人而写。"},{"type":"text","text":"我喜欢通过文字去了解一个人，我也希望别人也能通过文字了解我。我更希望我通过记录这些，让我也更了解自己。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90b86b60-cdea-46cc-b05b-f2aa91d9eea3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"924981fb-1c3d-4945-97dd-aa8ab285adba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这里会记录我所的读的书、我喜欢看的电影、我的兴趣爱好、我的工作生活习惯、我所认知的概念，总之，是我能告知并写成文档的一切。"}]}]}
cards.title: 为什么做个人笔记？

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a027b0e4-8045-4f71-bf00-ad8563741725","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文案写作指南"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c90ccfdd-aabe-433a-bc5d-3fd192cc4d66","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30236d37-0a7f-4e01-b45a-f009d1b6a175"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"英文与非标点的中文之间需要有一个空格，如「Jopus 笔记」而不是「Jopus笔记」。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"72a33cb3-34c0-45ee-aa8c-aba81e479022","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1199d611-3e56-4886-ae74-16526cf7ea72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要多检查校对仔细检查，确保没有错别字。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"968b12c2-84f4-45fd-9c1a-b0d9feb7c5b3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"379fe977-9fe2-4e7c-8737-5de64482d010"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"注意特殊名词的大小写，如 Android、iOS、iPhone、Google 等。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e46c77ef-ec9d-4fbc-9bd5-94573d5134f3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9eb4df7-a776-4ea8-a9af-f7e8f2104a86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尽可能使用中文数词，如「我数学得了零分」。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00820682-c784-4ef5-b225-d28ba023b0a8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a72050b9-60ff-4263-845e-e895eee1b7b2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数字与单位之间需要有一个空格，如「5 GB」而不是「5GB」。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6c8e73c1-b610-49c6-91ae-901143af649b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18f94752-13e7-481e-a0d0-ddb8be0e5311"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尽量避免中英文混用，只是不得不时才会使用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a666160b-1f65-4b8e-b4be-b4751d8b28e9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72c1f9d3-c1ef-4961-933c-127a6511f0a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只有中文或中英文混排中，一律使用中文/全角标点。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc4ee831-242f-42bc-b5f8-3397d870639e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71c30d94-4b5d-4b78-be7f-62e53fcb3d5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中英文混排中如果出现整句英文，则在这句英文中使用英文/半角标点。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9e202851-a154-46fc-b1ff-49e67bc8caea","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bba9590-c7e7-4765-b340-f41c2ac6a02b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中文标点与其他字符间一律不加空格。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"93bbf2c8-e98d-4e44-82c7-ac63ea448b4c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf94a355-eaa7-436d-8d51-891325ff405d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中文文案中使用中文引号「」和『』，其中「」为外层引号。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c192b56-8d7e-422a-b1c7-9f31b5f8b8c6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f5276c9-1203-488a-8ecd-8586263f468b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果是纯文本，段落之间使用一个空行隔开。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"857c2691-0c48-407e-8279-0a05067fbfad","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3cdccd65-a33d-476b-8c5f-c8e8c23ace06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果在正文中部分引用第三方内容，请使用恰当的引用格式并给出出处。如："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"4d5de44e-0c0e-4115-b8f8-ba389a793e24"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"021b4279-1c6c-4a33-948a-e806f7355c37"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"未经省察的人生不值得过。"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"— 苏格拉底"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c19fd6cb-19f1-44b6-8f29-7d0fd9dafbad","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d00487c-d0bd-4564-8e22-254213f0521b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在不是很正式或没有明确的个体指代对象的时候请用「你」，在指代特定个体时请用「您」，如邀请函尊称等。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"20280a42-6358-4d75-b7a4-9fd31010815e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0fea844a-a7ea-46cd-b823-b4d25a900a87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要称呼喜欢的用户为「粉丝」，而是使用「用户」。粉丝的说法显得不平等。而且很多人不喜欢这种称呼，它含有缺乏独立思考的意思。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbc84ab5-2c73-42c4-80c5-f9e58f3dff38"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7356d89a-f282-4ab4-a62c-e7f347d6f238","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"George Orwell 的六条写作规则"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"4f737731-a50c-42aa-b2c1-c5ec9b1f35c3"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64f6c62a-5ad2-4cb6-b75e-a3b45dd3850f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1.绝不要使用在印刷物里经常看到的隐喻、明喻和其他修辞方法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c7bf681-0c7b-48bf-9d8d-6ec52d33bf41"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2.如果一个字能说清，不要用两个字。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11b162ef-3eff-4504-941d-113409822f74"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3.但凡一个字能删掉，一定要删掉。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc45cbd9-2cf4-4d37-bd1e-7c7f9c0d7002"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4.只要能用主动语态，绝不要用被动语态。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5b35b46-3987-4f2e-9807-6dffaf3bf558"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5.能用常用词的时候，不要用外来词、科学术语和行话。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e270df8-13b9-4dd4-968d-b742ee23e63e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6.绝不要用粗俗语言，为此可以打破上面任一规则。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 文案写作指南

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4600879f-d159-4e93-8eed-006f13d49910","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"INFP"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff7cab8b-36fe-46eb-8fbb-3056631dbdca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"MBTI 中一种人格，大概这样的人是想得多，行动力差，严重内耗，拖延，但想象力丰富。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c07e4565-f80b-432d-8da8-f23bda0c439f"}},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0267e336-7de5-4b4a-ac4c-ba86ed1d90ae","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22c5d2a4-9fe8-49e2-9404-04ad27095c3e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内向：INFP 倾向内省,更喜欢独处或与少数亲密朋友交往。他们需要大量独处时间来认识自己、思考和恢复精力。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a58fef23-1f60-484b-8e21-9746a32d2c42","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c051a40e-13f8-40ab-9802-44ab9f7ae5d2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直觉：INFP 善于理解抽象概念、洞察事物的本质,更偏向于关注未来及可能性。他们擅长想象和创造力。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"66509575-b0bb-42ec-8774-2309c42db934","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70268c99-0f7e-44c2-9016-2b83808b6a60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"感受：INFP 以感受和价值观为导向,对人和事物有深刻的情感体验。他们注重人际关系，希望事物符合内心的信念和理想。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"496b3901-56c9-4606-b2a8-cbec89d21de7","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57a1d195-e8d1-484c-ba97-6d8f9af0fc08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"感知：INFP 更喜欢保持开放和灵活的态度,偏好顺其自然、接纳变化。他们容易适应新环境,对计划和时间表不太执着。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"62e443c8-3ecd-4418-8e92-81c0965a08e8","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00093afa-280e-46ea-9ee6-9f9d7bab458b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"富于同情心和同理心： INFP 能深刻理解和分享他人的情感，乐于提供支持和鼓励。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bb37ee4b-db05-47dd-a7d8-46955669d1cb","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd95059c-c377-4538-9e79-247c8eb0b974"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重视内心世界：INFP 内心生活丰富多彩，他们关注个人发展和精神追求，对外部事物感兴趣的程度较低。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49c42938-c941-4b97-bb34-5dd16d169841","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"761ba7cc-abe0-4ed7-94da-e0896a1d778f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"理想主义和创造力：INFP 追求理想，对自己和他人都有很高的标准。他们擅长艺术创作、写作等创造性活动。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a2bb9f6-2d1a-4b51-b64b-bb9a39e2a0fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，INFP 是一种内心生活丰富、注重价值观和感受的独特性格类型。善于洞见内心世界，但也可能在现实生活中感到困惑或孤独。"}]}]}
cards.title: INFP

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"365d508f-63e5-42e4-becd-1e0206dcbae3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Readme"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc450600-5fef-4268-aabb-540bd4c998f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我是一个 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/8e062dc1-bdf1-4b80-9ad7-6dfe6781b56f","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"INFP"},{"type":"text","text":"，产品运营"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a4b347c-b499-474b-991a-045b64bb30aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"祖籍山东，生于东北长于东北"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"10d6cb64-8719-47ad-8a8f-c3260e8078a5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2d830be-2287-4cc8-8151-cbff4e60c354"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/c2b98aa9-e170-44f9-a53a-283aec9c1b9f","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"极简主义"},{"type":"text","text":"/"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/2c3282a2-b39b-446d-965c-a25b92ad0676","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"存在主义"},{"type":"text","text":"者"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0dd23051-33a6-4752-86c9-2d865510d8c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"喜欢听摇滚，也喜欢听古典乐"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f854f4f-1643-4b6f-b15e-d6225a96786b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"常听的歌手有刘森/汉斯·季默/约翰·列侬/椿/麻园诗人/石岩/草东没有派对/刺猬/梅卡德尔等"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b45de92-75a3-40ae-a6e6-f0696c762b83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"喜欢的导演是诺兰，电影是《星际穿越》、《沙丘》系列"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"354b66f2-2711-4991-98ba-88c9ffcb585b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6a35e50-9838-4789-be74-831efc0a372a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"产品运营"},{"type":"text","text":"，曾在大厂做过螺丝钉，对文字较敏感，目前在运营一些社区自媒体"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee5619de-f194-401d-b360-7ccd364921f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"终身学习者"},{"type":"text","text":"，喜欢哲学、禅修、社会学、历史、思想史、非虚构写作、也喜欢学习方法阅读方法类的书籍或内容"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8f2e3892-805a-44d1-83a8-f575fb4a749d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6077a641-1785-45f8-ae26-6e4ddddf6463"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://jopus.cn/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"我的博客"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"，"},{"type":"text","text":"更新博客让我觉得没有那么打扰他人，也就没有太多社交压力，博客是一个轻压力的表达自留地。如果你有看博客的习惯，或者有 RSS 阅读器，可以输入网址订阅收藏我的博客。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"6a7d86c7-ab32-4c61-99df-7c9fd344037d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be19d097-d11b-4f86-9469-b54d6c4b0143"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果还想更多了解我，可查阅"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1186d249-ed1a-48c1-971d-786f62b5817a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}
cards.title: Readme

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6aa1d40d-d99c-4315-8989-aea243d0ef19","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"批判性思维"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11bbf37d-f4bc-4642-86a4-7ffe50529c73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"批判性思维是一种经过智力上的有规律的训练，积极而熟练地对通过观察、经验、反思、推理或沟通获得或生成的信息进行概念化、应用、分析、综合和/或评估的过程，作为信念和行动的指南。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7deba2c-8f01-47da-a82c-e969e8e4d6a1"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://twitter.com/mrbear1024/status/1786559397998510542/history","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 批判性思维

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4119d4ae-a898-4353-b4dd-0134c7149747","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"树莓派安装 Neovim"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9ee530b-096d-4a6d-acc0-e59f1a6b9dbc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Install Neovim on "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Raspberry Pi"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6607bdb5-d94f-408f-8899-fa1bca1394f2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bac583b-4545-494e-aca6-c8a699d9e923"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以直接通过命令行安装 snap："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"5697d01d-a48d-4b2b-bca4-8f3a55e37665","params":"shell"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"sudo apt update\n\nsudo apt install snapd"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ef70579-da38-4a66-9059-70eaf509cb12"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4281ab9a-ec32-4568-af65-9563bd0b9f09"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要重启树莓派："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"8d5750af-dc92-4090-acf1-49024b6f22ac","params":"shell"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"sudo reboot"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c771af16-e6b1-4054-84ce-6f1f8b7f5771"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14fbb5c3-8c76-4671-835d-f5efbdb4f922"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"安装核心 snap ："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"6a37ba02-115a-418e-95c8-298b03918647","params":"shell"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"sudo snap install core"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"327ba201-4a80-4145-af2a-1da8807cd912"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9080b7d-db33-4c76-ac04-9af9f38ed3f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"安装 Neovim 命令："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"79526e15-d6a7-4aa8-aa9c-8b8fb72fba5d","params":"shell"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"sudo snap install nvim --classic"}]}]}
cards.title: 树莓派安装 Neovim

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab7e887e-884a-4940-b880-e8fcc0965a62","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"树莓派强制安装 OpenAI 库"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"600122ea-2e63-487d-a8fd-556b07b78a76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你不想创建虚拟环境，但仍希望在树莓派上安装OpenAI库，你可以选择使用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"--break-system-packages"},{"type":"text","text":" 选项。不过，请注意这样做可能会影响系统的稳定性，特别是当系统更新或其他软件依赖这些Python包时。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09503ac2-f260-4919-9eaa-46db93c5741b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以下是如何在不创建虚拟环境的情况下安装OpenAI库的方法："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ff1ee93-53eb-41ae-b055-f5980306a4c3","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9391956f-77e8-47ce-8535-e190428a924d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"更新系统"},{"type":"text","text":"：
打开终端并运行以下命令，确保你的系统是最新的："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"b2d59868-03c2-47f3-9d31-8db2ac8c33de","params":"bash"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"76ab6584-c0bb-412e-9c11-cd6f739defd5","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3eabc6d-2d5c-4f25-8287-11bda0a16e9b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"安装OpenAI库"},{"type":"text","text":"：
使用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"pip3"},{"type":"text","text":" 并加上 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"--break-system-packages"},{"type":"text","text":" 选项来安装OpenAI库："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"40958ef8-e9f5-4a3d-9f8a-a7b8bcc2d9f2","params":"bash"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"pip3 install openai --break-system-packages"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97fa23d8-905c-416a-8ebb-be579779a2d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这将绕过环境管理的限制，直接在系统级别安装OpenAI库。"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3c50b646-e059-4927-9ea6-42cead922822","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52ad12b6-6d96-4742-bbca-fd46b03634f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"验证安装"},{"type":"text","text":"：
确认安装是否成功，你可以在Python中导入OpenAI库。打开Python解释器并运行以下命令："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"cbe0e25e-ace9-492d-8315-d42caa2ca893","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import openai
print(openai.__version__)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7904fc67-c517-4bc5-bc99-af33f3ca5e0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果没有错误信息，并且显示了版本号，那么说明安装成功。"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"74500204-e5bf-4a98-a7b4-c14545a71663","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"注意事项"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8646b993-1a48-4449-be73-097ee9a1570f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"--break-system-packages"},{"type":"text","text":" 选项会绕过环境管理的限制，但也可能带来一些风险，例如："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0485974d-cd1e-4107-9e73-c47309f6a98a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d71035c-5fb0-41b7-b4ad-31975483d9eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"系统更新可能会覆盖或破坏你安装的Python包。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"db78aff2-d27c-493c-997f-99363022a762","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56a39d65-aa19-4c2c-95ec-204343c9a465"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可能导致其他依赖这些包的系统工具或应用程序出问题。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c05f1a9-d261-4389-a6bb-1806133440ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因此，尽量在了解这些风险后再选择这种方法。推荐的做法仍然是使用虚拟环境，以确保系统的稳定性和可靠性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9183505-8e12-4af2-8c25-715c12b5eb17"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你希望避免这些风险，还是建议使用虚拟环境或者将你的项目代码迁移到一个支持虚拟环境的目录下进行开发。"}]}]}
cards.title: 树莓派强制安装 OpenAI 库

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d046d9b0-8fe2-4848-89d9-97a0193752bf","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"LaTeX 自学笔记"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"575f30e0-f455-44a2-b1f0-de599d77090a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么是 LaTeX"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d077cb68-98d1-4d08-ad5b-582ac9b94907"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"LaTeX 是一种专业的排版文档工具，由 TeX 引擎处理。通过嵌入文本命令来指导和控制排版过程。最后通过命令生成 PDF 文档。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5ecf77b0-8564-4d32-b078-50ec1f936bf2","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要学 LaTeX"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d3375d4-ecb0-4bf0-b333-aa5b1fb0867d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可编程性和可扩展性，能够处理复杂的文档形式和高度自由可定制化的文档样式。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"66d76afe-2d58-4f45-a7f3-896a263e50cb","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overleaf 是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97a70a7f-f91f-47f4-aa47-986769fe3049"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overleaf 是在线的 LaTeX 写作编译器，类似于设计中的 Figma。目前我用的是Overleaf的社区版。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8584113f-81c6-4a7a-a24f-45040f3fd9de"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7a3afaa-bf66-4490-bf8b-847d614d1445"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下面是一段简单的示例："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"d6a93eaa-c0bf-43f3-b912-57165f40cc9d","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\documentclass{article} 
\begin{document}
这是一份 LaTeX 示例文档
\end{document}"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86a8f6eb-02d0-4eef-b6fe-db69fc3318b1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7ce95a2-8ffc-49cd-9531-1681db3d362b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但是，它运行的时候是不能显示中文的。要让它正常显示中文，需要点击左上角的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"Menu"},{"type":"text","text":"按钮，把"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"Compiler"},{"type":"text","text":"更改为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"XelaTex"},{"type":"text","text":"然后代码更改为，如下："}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"ceda644d-cc38-47ab-a7c8-865cd4f97cab","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\documentclass{article} % 声明文档类型
\usepackage{UTF8}{ctex} % 设置中文包
\begin{document} % 开始文档
你好，这是一个测试文档。 % 这里是文档内容
\end{document} % 结束文档"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4739b57-79b2-4f6d-8e72-0a285662faeb"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab794c65-a275-4898-8b84-a9b141131a04","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"全局调整字号大小"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"04af9632-f94a-425b-98f3-eb3e33f9fd0f","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\renewcommand{\normalsize}{\fontsize{11pt}{13pt}\selectfont}"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a7952fb-2d89-4661-b590-dcc9d13ca2d8"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e6c9ca78-34a9-4839-afdf-072fd23230f0","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"换行符"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"396cb002-70b8-40d4-be19-d7c5e464aaa9","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\ 换行符
%  注释符"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67b6682b-bb13-4138-8fe4-1e8e970082e3"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e8d6b984-8a4a-4729-9c00-df8e23e409cb","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"居中设置"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"cef66a1a-671e-47b6-afe3-2f16815b366e","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{center}
\centering
这里是居中的文本。
\end{center}"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b71592d-7e61-499c-89e6-d3102ea50270"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9629a2f7-dc8c-473e-99de-d446c579fc0b","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置某行字体大小"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"d1adb268-d888-4c61-8817-22c47f9bcf4c","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\mbox{\fontsize{16pt}{16pt}\selectfont 这是一行字} %设置16pt的字"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4c2ae109-ddb7-429c-8a9c-d83b1b2dee97","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插入图片"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"6f3bb4ee-cc76-40cf-b6a7-bb192d476380","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\usepackage{graphicx} % 引入图片
\includegraphics[width=1\linewidth]{cover.png} %图片需要手动传入根目录"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b27cbac3-7315-4425-948f-922f26121724"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ebde9eb9-19b8-474e-a072-1b7ac6ad0dbb","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"扉页设置"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"a425eff4-296c-420d-8580-21d90654bb86","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"% 扉页内容
\thispagestyle{empty} % 扉页没有页眉
\newcommand{\publisher}{Jopus Manual CC BY-NC-ND 4.0} % 设置出版社信息
\vfill % 将文本移动到页面底部
\centering
\publisher
\vfill

% 扉页之后，设置正常页眉页脚
\newpage
\pagenumbering{arabic} % 如果需要，可以再次声明页码格式
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{} % 清除预设的页眉页脚
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt} % 隐藏页眉下划线
\fancyfoot[C]{\thepage} % 在页脚中央显示页码"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"593693f4-56e6-4aae-8caa-f0a545c7447f"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7ef97c64-864e-4428-8d5e-c70e56bed714","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"导入自定义字体"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"73eaa7da-a567-4f72-9bfe-38366d1cb6f1","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\usepackage{fontspec} % 设置字体
% 手动在根目录传入otf格式字体
\setmainfont{smileysans.otf} % 设置字体"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0d146c6-2841-4e76-9b57-1c66035d72d1"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"61b5f0d4-28a9-455e-8257-dde3c59f6c7d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"添加空行"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"d763b5cf-c62d-4199-ac05-42957e0d9c13","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\vspace{10pt} % 添加10pt的空行"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a32684c0-3d3d-4a4b-89b7-7850fbb46514","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置页码"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"93125057-67e9-4848-8000-87cf6c5cdcff","params":"latex"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"% 使用fancyhdr宏包设置页眉页脚页码
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy} % 设置文档使用fancy页风格
\fancyhf{} % 清除预设的页眉页脚
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt} % 隐藏页眉下划线
\fancyfoot[C]{\thepage} % 在页脚中央显示页码"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93f048cb-e2ab-480c-9928-06c42c569f38"}}]}
cards.title: LaTeX 自学笔记

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"73852e67-23c5-450f-a960-4f55df0c1ebb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Python 自学笔记"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1e25b5ae-c671-4b12-b3ae-4dcc58e1cf6c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要学 Python"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eef372d5-ebfa-4321-8629-985520e138ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Python 是一门如今比较流行的语言，各种开源适配都比较好。还比如树莓派也对 Python 比较友好，更像数据分析、数据可视化、神经网络、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/a39c4400-a91c-4317-aada-74b9f2d60cb1","edited":false,"title":null,"data-internal-href":null}}],"text":"深度学习"},{"type":"text","text":"等等，Python 都能胜任。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f3959cb-a937-4b91-90a0-a32a193cca7c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"虽然，我严格意义上说的入门编程的语言是 Swift，但是 Python 我是必须要学会的一门语言。这将有利于我日后的学习折腾很多其他东西的一门重要的桥梁。我也很推荐现在的学生应该都学习一下 Python，我觉得最起码应该从中学就开始接触学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0541aaca-a03b-4681-8c9a-38dd7ef59e2b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下定决心学 Python 是因为我最近这几年一直技术上不够了解，虽然做了这么多年的运营和产品，但是没有系统的学一门语言，着实不好。科技在一天天的进步，我也应该多学习。人生或许没有什么意义，但是去了解未知或去用新的科技去创造一个产品，我想我都必须要系统的学会一门语言。在当下，如果必须学一门语言，我想最有性价比的就是 Python。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bfcaeb7-713b-4586-8b15-96bf512b64ee"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5642ec67-abb5-4756-8982-7fd63edab9c0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用树莓派/ Mac 学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60c6178c-127a-4843-aa59-6361929a1133"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习 Python 的过程中，最让人头大的就是各种环境的处理。我平常主要用 Mac 工作，但是安装环境比较费劲，所以我买了一台树莓派专门学习来 Python，这让我安装各种环境折腾时，比较没有压力。配合 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/d6281fcd-8edd-49db-8285-0f673945ede8/card/cb85ad0c-8f4a-4142-9bef-b19c86f3d021","edited":false,"title":null,"data-internal-href":null}}],"text":"Jupyter Notebook"},{"type":"text","text":" 文学编程别有一番风味，树莓派是一个很好的学习设备，不光能学习 Python 还能学习 Linux 实践。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"228b4c2b-e6ad-4ed1-8ef3-0473c83ece83"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"328a961f-efc9-48bc-aaa6-0f54a0080b66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后来通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a39c4400-a91c-4317-aada-74b9f2d60cb1"}},{"type":"text","text":"的接触了 Anaconda 后，在 Mac 上也安装并使用 conda 来学习 "},{"type":"text","text":"方法"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"0d19e14d-d7b7-4bcc-aaa5-90ca5afbfc26","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"r = requests as req
url = "https://image.gcores.com/b8d29523-45e5-473b-a02e-ff45e3ca3d89.jpg"
r = req.get(url)

with open('balckhole.jpg', mode='wb') as file:
  file.write(r.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a906a816-a090-4e8c-bc43-88172c2cd9d5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8019a2a0-ecc8-432e-9993-1421a1b4d916"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下载 PDF 文件"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"c1b73925-bf37-43f2-9a62-544e6b67e7f8","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import requests as req

r = req.get(url)

with open('universitymean.pdf', mode='wb') as file:
  file.write(r.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"123f1a0e-1b77-4b71-8496-1e5f97fc72f1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"022833ba-1235-49a1-9ad3-a991ab65a44a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Headers"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"6610cb41-1cd5-4a4f-9804-95b9dd3464df","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import requests
response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/get', headers={'User-Agent': 'My App'})
print(response.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92f3f891-d1b9-42e8-b47d-b4930f4a0e6d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38584615-3c07-4929-8002-2ee4b58de397"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Cookies"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"65f9345a-bc57-4ef4-a715-86fb18594b35","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import requests
response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/cookies', cookies={'session_id': '12345'})
print(response.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a277cdba-07bf-4892-b7cf-df8ba2efff89"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"077f40c1-a7c7-419e-b715-dd64338b47f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Auth认证"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"7585545d-7c03-4779-bdec-a6d79108029b","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import requests
response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/basic-auth/user/passwd', auth=('user', 'passwd'))
print(response.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e87b4d5b-f053-48dc-8c7c-58b0ede46676"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c685982b-02a6-4a9f-9d9b-da53620935e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"SSL验证"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"afc3f8d6-587f-4a27-ba7b-93709a2a6e1d","params":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import requests
response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/get', verify='/patn/to/certfile')
print(response.content)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"772b1377-fbe7-4ca9-aae7-46ff565ae398"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9085ab0-8850-4e54-91c3-d85736cde344"}}]}

"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34f9f946-8b1c-4cc8-a1f7-040f9a88baea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"哈罗德•布鲁姆《西方正典》；《荷马史诗导读》（程志敏） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"beaa8248-6043-429a-94a8-9de4d381b24a"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e1b62c00-df23-43b8-89e5-ef543e080139","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四、其他 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41f6dd17-479a-4853-8679-1629d2dde3bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《余光中谈翻译》、思果《翻译研究》《翻译新究》、冯象《宽宽信箱与出埃及记》（钱钟书《七缀集》、许渊冲等亦可选） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26cf7c82-f75c-4d08-8d0a-8909884a14a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中国期刊网：《社会学研究》、《开放时代》、《中国社会科学》、《史学理论研究》、《社会》 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1ca3ea7-5f9c-42fb-bb02-f465e429d2d2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以书代刊：《中国社会学》、《思想与社会》、《新史学》（大象、中华书局两种系列）、《思想史研究》、《历史人类学学刊》（中山大学）、《社会理论》（商务） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bcd96542-b68d-47be-bf0e-ef094dad02c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"网站：清华《社会学学术社区》（论坛与博客）；北大三校社会学论坛电子书板块；往复论坛"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38844337-70b4-4cc0-9474-1f4194be0704"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"台大、清大、中研院、交通、东海、辅仁等台校社会、人类、政治、历史、文化研究、社会理论等系所网站上的讨论会pdf论文、期刊电子版、课程大纲、人员介绍等 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e5751507-29e8-41e4-9f61-021c318e7108"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要重点关注、跟踪检索的汉语社会学理论及个别相关领域学人例举（包括图书馆、网络、期刊库、课程网站等）： "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8342d5b9-b543-4396-90e3-6cc27de464a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"叶启政、孙中兴、朱元鸿、赖晓黎、钱永祥、王晴佳（以上台湾） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"374c4954-3a37-4948-ac11-1b283aded5a6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"李猛、渠敬东、应星、田耕、吴飞、王楠、成伯清、肖瑛、吕鹏、何蓉、赵立玮（以上大陆） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc1aad52-e492-4ceb-be3b-86456a83046c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类学：王铭铭、王明珂、赵秉祥、梁永佳、哈光甜 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30db1e88-258a-4985-b6ae-e1895c778bd0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"历史学：葛兆光、彭刚、桑兵、罗志田（以下社会史）赵世瑜、陈春声、刘志伟…… "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6336b17-b95e-4878-9819-1ae0507cd269"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其 他：甘阳、刘小枫、孙立平、贺照田、吴增定、张旭、柯小刚…… "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"065161fc-dddd-4c25-af3a-3bc7bbedd199"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"清华社会学系、复旦哲学系和历史系、同济哲学社会学系、中山历史系、政法社会学院 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc8e2528-217b-4e6c-a6b0-958989c67a61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"五 核心英文期刊（仅包括北大图书馆有全文权限者） "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98719e8b-b1e2-4bfe-9158-4f2c855fb259"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"American Journal of Sociology "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f442df6-1d4b-4172-88f6-439184bb595c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"American Sociological Review "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14866324-3962-4403-9163-f366512a976c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"History and Theory "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e9b0502-7c37-4470-b029-e6471c7b20b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Theory and Society "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"239e020f-dea7-4102-b7c2-5067c22335c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modern China "}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9407193d-2739-4a8d-83e8-92b2cfb05825","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Requests"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3730591f-c0f4-4415-a8fe-6beab0276063"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Python 的 Request 库是一个网络请求库，同步类型的库。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7ea9386-217a-46b6-88ed-f9b2b069991c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Request 库提供了非常方便的 API 来发送 HTTP 请求，是最受欢迎的 HTTP 客户端库之一。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b9555ea-15e5-4699-8d17-c41cdcb172d5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5811b8cc-b1ee-4e7f-94e2-c247c0103865"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"优点："},{"type":"text","text":"API 简单易用，社区支持强大。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec9f3e6b-fa99-4374-9e8b-98a7653a4741"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"缺点："},{"type":"text","text":"不支持异步。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"894192f0-cd2f-4b29-a513-b6fa25a1a757"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"适用场景："},{"type":"text","text":"大多数 HTTP 请求场景，尤其是对性能要求不是非常高的同步程序。"}]}]}
cards.title: Requests

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"55a2c26d-45f5-423f-979f-cdd655592e65","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图学园"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4eb3416c-f9e4-42ae-8b7d-f400a1c8a7c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前387年，在雅典城外西北角约两公里处的阿卡德米，出现了一所学校。学校座落在美丽的克菲索斯河畔，这里绿树成荫，鸟语花香，风景幽美，富有特色的建筑和别具一格的雕塑被掩映在一片绿荫深处。学校的大门口挂着一块醒目的牌子，上面赫然写道：“不懂几何者不得入内”。这就是欧洲历史上第一所传授知识、进行学术研究、提供政治咨询、培养人才的综合性学校——柏拉图学园。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1a06bfbe-c85c-4208-ae9c-49fc0092023c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"柏拉图和“人世间最有智慧的人”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab3b5d65-8499-4762-aaec-f5a71f009f6a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"abd8fda6-981e-44db-aad2-f4fddb756407"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前427年5月7日，正值古希腊第88届奥运会期间的一天，柏拉图出生在雅典附近的伊齐那岛一个显赫的贵族家庭。那是伯罗奔尼撤战争爆发后的第四个年头，这场战争一直打到柏拉图23岁才以雅典的失败而告终。那一天也是太阳神阿波罗的生日，太阳神乃是光明之神、生命之神、智慧之神，人们传说柏拉图就是阿波罗显灵而生下的“神童”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"916961d7-61a0-4277-9314-e227072fa27f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图的母亲是雅典被称为七贤之一的著名政治家和诗人梭伦的后裔，父亲的谱系可以上溯到雅典最后一位君王科德鲁斯。家庭的富有使柏拉图自幼受到良好的教育，父亲给他请的三位启蒙老师，分别讲授写作、艺术和体育。柏拉图的写作老师经常讲一些故事给他听，有时让他模仿着书中的故事，写一些小故事出来。渐渐地，柏拉图对写作产生了浓厚的兴趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce41de47-9cde-4a86-b336-014e1159ca42"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图声音甜美，为人谦逊。他精通音律，担任过合唱团的指挥。他身高体健，气力过人，参加过三次战役，还曾代表雅典在希腊各邦的竞技大赛中获得摔跤冠军。其实，“柏拉图”并非其真名，他原名叫亚里斯多（意为“非常非常牛”），因为他的前额看上去特别宽广，所以他的体育老师给他起了个绰号——Platus（意为“平坦宽阔”），喻为“博大精深”。柏拉图自己也喜欢这个优雅的绰号，而他的真名实姓却渐渐被人们忘记了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c2c1a18-b124-426b-a339-7e52ea4504eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"青年时期的柏拉图和其他贵族子弟一样，受到当时社会各种思潮的影响。他曾经拜读过毕达哥拉斯的哲学，后来又成了赫拉克利特的追随者。勤奋好学的柏拉图还热衷于文艺创作，写过赞美酒神的颂诗和其他抒情诗，极富文学天赋。柏拉图年轻的时候梦想成为文学家，可是，当他听到大哲学家苏格拉底充满睿智的演讲后，感觉自己原先的生活瞬间变得四分五裂，卑微得如同脚下的尘土。于是，他一把火烧毁了自己的诗稿，改变了青年时的虚幻梦想，毅然决定拜面貌丑陋，却和蔼正直、能言善辩的苏格拉底为师。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2d9997a-ba33-426f-9f4b-a0856420ecac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"苏格拉底是当时雅典最有学问的人了，他经常在一些公开场合讲课。苏格拉底和柏拉图母亲的兄长交往密切，曾是柏拉图家中的常客。比苏格拉底整整小40岁的柏拉图，幼年就认识苏格拉底，随着年岁的增长，他越来越倾慕苏格拉底的思想和人品，在他的心目中苏格拉底是“人世间最有智慧的人”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4f7569b-9ccd-463e-8220-cded86f23d9b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前407年，也就是柏拉图20岁的那一年，他来到苏格拉底的住处，小心翼翼地敲开了苏格拉底的门。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffc4abb5-9737-45c3-8f90-a07d59f18bb4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“尊敬的苏格拉底先生，我是柏拉图，我想成为您的学生。”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"194db256-1fb7-47ae-bd6f-4df190aaff0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"苏格拉底接见了他，坐下以后苏格拉底问道："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a26cd1a-4e92-494c-ad40-e5a8f0ffe649"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“年轻人，你的名字我早就听说过了，你已经是一个学识很渊博的人了，为什么还要拜我为师呢？”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49571c28-57fb-4474-9f83-679672e1c82d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“您有一句话我记得很清楚，那就是‘认识自己’，如今我就是没有认识自己”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1bae6f0-0c16-4b4d-8446-cd3f66aef167"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“你既然知道我这一句话，那么你也应该知道我对自己的评价了——‘我所知道的是我始终一无所知’”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7067f55d-3d9e-4af9-ab41-e4b71e6800c0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“神都认为您最聪明，可是您却这样评价自己，这正是我学习的地方。一个人不知道自己的无知，那才是双倍的无知呢！这也是我为什么来拜您为师的理由。”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af071b77-092c-4a11-bb31-5fddfae820b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经过这一次谈话以后，苏格拉底终于答应将柏拉图收为自己的学生。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c696d359-5cd1-4024-8326-fb86eb32383e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相传苏格拉底曾经做了一个奇怪的梦，他梦见一只天鹅轻轻地落在了他的膝上，眨眼间羽翼丰满，唱着最优美的歌曲，腾空而去……。第二天，就有人向他引荐柏拉图，在这名年轻弟子的身上，苏格拉底似乎看到了自己梦中的天鹅。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed2852a4-776c-4187-aa1b-3df7f79d5d7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"开学第一天，苏格拉底对学生们说：“今天我们只学一件最简单，也是最容易做的事。每人把胳膊尽量往前甩，然后再尽量往后甩。”苏格拉底示范了一遍，“每天做300下，大家能做到吗？”一年后，只有柏拉图一个人坚持了下来。正是这种坚持不懈、持之以恒的精神，使他成为“人世间最有智慧的人”苏格拉底最得意的学生。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb9ca095-fcfe-41cc-b9f6-2cf170be8520"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"688f7176-1169-40c8-b738-ee3f5f5fd869","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"游走他乡，汲取智慧"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4359aefb-4650-4246-87b1-5f4d56d7b4d0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5743e0a-1d3d-4ab9-85f6-52ff28abac6a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图在苏格拉底身边形影不离地学习了整整8年，正当他满怀希望施展自己宏大的政治抱负时，雅典政局发生了剧烈的变动：持续28年的伯罗奔尼撒战争以雅典失败而告终，“三十僭主”推翻了民主政治，但因施行暴政而在8个月后又被推翻；雅典恢复了民主政治，但它又以莫须有的罪名审判了苏格拉底。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc72f056-1a6e-4a19-b500-4376ddcf2809"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前399年初夏的一天，一个由500人组成的审判团公开审判了苏格拉底。当柏拉图听到法庭宣布他尊敬的老师死刑的时候，痛心疾首，他没有想到法庭竟然以“不敬神和蛊惑青年”的罪名处死那么一位伟大的人。这让柏拉图意识到，政治是最复杂的职业，任何有良心的人都不要介入政治。与此同时，他也渴望找到一个有效治愈国家疾病的良方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a710264e-9c69-43c1-a475-46e0a75d6373"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由于柏拉图是苏格拉底的学生，所以他难免有遭遇迫害的危险。为了躲避灾难，柏拉图和他的几个朋友在它们的老师死后立即逃离雅典，游走他乡。本来只是要避避风头，没想到这一走就是12年。当初他不过是个28岁的大小伙，等到返回雅典的土地时，已过不惑之年。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e478b0a8-2987-4da5-97ad-7e263363b0be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在毗邻雅典的麦加拉住着柏拉图的朋友欧几里德。欧几里德被誉为“几何学之父”，我们平时用到的平面几何知识多源于他那本传世经典《几何原本》。欧几里德年轻时对苏格拉底学说崇拜到近乎疯狂的地步，他对一切世俗的实用主义嗤之以鼻。有一次，有个学生问他：“学习几何有何用？”他当场令家奴塞给这位学生三个铜板，打发他走路。欧几里德气愤地说：“他怎么会是我的学生呢？他只想从所学的知识中得到好处！”柏拉图就是和这样一位同门师兄一起，开始认真整理苏格拉底的学说。但工作没多久，两人就发现各自对老师的理解有着根本分歧，无法形成统一的观点，于是很快分道扬镳了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ec71627-16fe-4f39-ae9d-9af6dba9bd35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图从麦加拉去了非洲，先是在埃及，后在昔勒尼，以后又到意大利和西西里等地游历。在昔勒尼，随著名数学家狄奥多鲁斯潜心学习数学，对数学有了深刻印象，并打下坚实的基础。有一回，瘟疫肆虐，人们到阿波罗神庙祈求治病的药方，没想到求得的神谕居然是一到复杂的几何题。正在大家无计可施之时，柏拉图很快帮忙解决了这一难题。为了报答他，人们自发组成了规模浩大的游行队伍，足足庆贺了一整天。后来，当地人又提出重铸阿波罗神像的建议，他们想把神像扩大一倍，结果计算出了问题，使其整体增大了8倍，后来还是柏拉图想出了解决的办法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d46bf3d-481d-470a-8eae-164a1247e620"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在意大利南部的达林顿，柏拉图结交了毕达哥拉斯学派的主要代表人物阿尔希塔斯，向他请教如何将数理知识巧妙运用到政治当中，用数学推导政治的变化情况，以消除分配差距的问题。他仔细考察了这些地区的政治、法律、宗教和教育制度，学习了当地的数学、物理、天文、音乐等知识，研究了各种哲学学说。对柏拉图的数学领悟和教育思想以及世界观、人生观、价值观的形成都产生了深刻的影响。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e43c4380-8baa-4f41-8368-a67a3bfe0227"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前388年，柏拉图来到了西西里岛上的一个叫叙拉古的城邦，他对国王狄奥尼修斯一世印象恶劣，觉得他是不讲道德之徒，不可能有智慧，更不可能治国安民。他的言论大大触怒了狄奥尼修斯一世，于是被这位暴君送往市场当作奴隶拍卖。在和其他奴隶一起经过长途的艰难跋涉后，柏拉图被带到了奴隶交易市场。灰心丧气的他看着面前穿梭的人流、稀奇古怪的买家，突然感受到命运的坎坷。然而不久，他便忘记了自己的奴隶身份，开始在地上津津有味演算起数学来。幸亏一个叫第昂的好友出了一笔钱把他赎了出来，送回雅典。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"910d4bb7-1d31-4cd8-bc43-7912f62f7f1b"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fcd453a4-674f-4f0c-aa99-7f7d5962bbb8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"柏拉图学园和“理想国”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6fc6e54-c0c5-447a-8ca7-7b92568475ad"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e908ee94-2390-4cb6-9ebc-499b36856b21"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前387年，柏拉图回到雅典时已年届四十。当时整个希腊世界日薄西山，奄奄一息。经过了一番游历之后，柏拉图失去了一些青年人的热情，却获得了思想的成熟。他在青年时代热衷于政治，希望能参加政治事务，公正地治理城邦，但是现实告诉他，包括雅典在内的所有城邦都不能做到这一点。最后，他认为，只有在正确的哲学指导下才能分辨正义和非正义，只有当哲学家成为统治者，或者当统治者成为真正的哲学家时，城邦治理才能是真正公正的。他意识到，要实现政治理想，就必须培养一批既懂得政治，又通晓哲学和科学的人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1b43760-c425-4792-98f4-00bf779d41f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"于是，在朋友们竭尽全力的资助下，柏拉图在雅典近郊的阿卡德米购置了一片土地，创办了一所自己的学校。阿卡德米座落在美丽的克菲索斯河边，两岸林木茂密，婀娜多姿。它原来是雅典城外西北角一个为纪念希腊战斗英雄阿卡德米而建立的运动场，后来改为花园。传说当年这位勇士就是在这里勇敢地杀死了凶猛的巨龙，用龙牙培育出其他助手，最终凭借无比的勇气建立了城邦。现在，柏拉图要凭借自己无限的智慧在这里灌溉出一片新的园地。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d7c14bc-8c2d-4313-a502-d983354a1182"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图学园是欧洲历史上第一个真正招收学生，具有大学性质的学校。学园定有规章制度，设有授课厅、博物馆、图书馆和学生宿舍等，一切按照计划运转。学园的主要课程是哲学和数学，同时也传授天文、历史、法律、文学、音乐等知识。学园一开始就吸引了一大批希腊各地和地中海沿岸的青年才俊，他们慕名从四面八方蜂拥而至，以在阿卡德米拥有一席之地为荣，更多的学生学成之后再也没有离开这里。学园之中始终洋溢着浓厚的学术气氛、充满着强烈的理想主义色彩。阿卡德米很快成了希腊闻名的学术中心，阿卡德米（Academy）这个词也流传至今，成为西方各国主要学术研究机构的专有名词。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a312e71f-0f9f-4fa8-9170-c138cd4efbfe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"苏格拉底之死，使柏拉图对雅典政府非常不满，于是，他决定继承苏格拉底的事业和思想，继续探求哲学和政治结合的途径，寻找一个理想的社会制度，建立一个理想的国家。他将阿卡德米作为宣传自己哲学观点和实现自己政治理想的基地，为希腊许多城邦的统治者培养和输送了许多政治骨干。他在学园里辛勤耕耘了40个春秋，直至80岁去世。在这一期间，柏拉图一面用讲课、对话、提问和讨论等形式进行教学活动，一面著书立说，写下了一大批哲学著作，其中他的《理想国》对西方哲学史的影响尤为深远。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0912a672-a28c-4188-8753-3d11f9ff1f37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了这个幻想中的“理想国”，柏拉图旅行了许多国家，每到一处他都要向那里的著名学者学习，并耗费了大量的心思和笔墨。柏拉图梦寐以求的“理想国”，一切都是公有的，甚至没有自私的婚姻，男人和女人可以任意组成临时夫妻。国家鼓励优秀的男女在一起多生育孩子，而那些先天不足的孩子则会被偷偷地丢弃，以提高“理想国”的人口素质。孩子生下来之后交给国家抚养，有专门的保育员为他们提供同样的照顾，他们喝一样的牛奶，用一样的尿布。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5db78cdb-273d-4c2d-9ea4-3349051c6552"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在柏拉图的“理想国”中，一个人应该做与他身份相符的事，农民只管种田，手工业者只管做工，商人只管做生意，平民不能参与国家大事。他说，做一双鞋子还要找一个手艺好的人，生了病还要请一位良医，而治理国家这样的大事如果交给随便什么人，这岂不荒唐？因此，柏拉图主张，在“理想国”中居于中坚地位、起中流砥柱作用的人物，无疑是哲学王。既然这样，教育的最高理想和全部核心，就是要培养能接近真正善的哲学王。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7cb19624-1651-4ce7-8a3a-113337bd392d"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"87f0e08c-ba0f-49c7-99b4-dab63581796a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"“不懂几何者不得入内”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bae9021-0a1d-4843-9b0d-d97b8152118e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f7ba5566-3a6b-4c75-9233-450a655b7d87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在柏拉图看来，用哲学家的学识与智慧管理国家，是哲学家的使命，更是国家的幸运。为了培养哲学王，柏拉图认为国家应担负教育的责任，而且教育应从幼年开始。他甚至提出了胎教的主张，并指出幼儿教育的手段主要是讲故事、做游戏和简易的歌唱活动等。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92a3068d-3568-4b32-bfa9-a57a0eac5559"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图认为，学习数学、天文、音乐等课程，虽然有些实用意义，但它们的真正价值不在这里，而在于它们能够唤起人们的思维能力，改变人们的心灵，使之从感性世界转向理性世界。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"812d1555-3678-4410-b302-c88472cf4b0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图高度重视数学，在他看来，不懂数学的人，不可能接受哲学知识。学习数学，主要是为了激发思维，“用自己的纯粹理性看到数的本质”，用数学去论证其哲学；学习天文，主要是通过观察天文现象，激发人们去思考，并从思维的运动中，产生时间的概念，从而进入哲学的研究。数学一直是学园的主打课程。从公元6世纪以来就广为流传一个故事，说是在柏拉图学园的大门口刻有“不懂几何者不得入内”的铭文，这可能是有史以来从知识方面规定入学条件的最早记录。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb1f8695-e79e-4126-bc7e-55daefdf4a29"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实，在柏拉图主持的学园教育中，除数学、天文外，音乐等艺术课程也受到推重。希腊的诗歌总是配上乐曲的，因此，音乐在希腊生活中具有举足轻重的地位。柏拉图说，音乐教育比起其他教育重要得多，因为“一个儿童从小受到了好的教育，节奏与和谐侵入了他的心灵深处，在那里牢牢生了根……再者，一个受过适当教育的儿童，对于人工制品或自然物的缺点也最敏感，因而对丑恶的东西会非常反感，对优美的东西会非常赞赏，感受其鼓舞，并从中汲取营养。”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c43f104f-e264-4c4d-956a-f6c67147db7b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当然，人文科学在柏拉图学园也倍受关注，柏拉图把哲学关注的对象扩大到了一个前所未有的广泛领域，诸如公有制、财产、社会主义、共产主义、优生学、计划生育、自由恋爱、妇女解放、道德规范等等，这些问题在他的教学和著作中都有所涉及。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a60b9d9d-6ed9-42c2-9df8-08ca720de026"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图在实践中经受多次碰壁之后，他的政治理想有所降低，但他想按照哲学的正义原则治理城邦的思想却并没有放弃。他虽然后来以主要的精力从事哲学研究，越来越少参加政治实践，但仍想以他的思想影响城邦统治者。所以，柏拉图学园除了知识传授外，还有一个特别功能，即提供政治咨询。许多周边的国家、城邦在建国、立法、组建政府时遇到麻烦，都会慕名来此求助。这有点像今天的政策研究室或策略研究公司。柏拉图经常派遣学园学生积极参与各城邦的政治活动，想通过学园传播自己的政治理念，想通过学生实现自己的政治理想，这一点与中国春秋战国时代孔老夫子的做法大体相同，但是明显区别在于柏拉图特别重视对学生科学知识的传授和训练。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d425ae63-e3a5-4cd5-9e48-324a570851ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图学园的政治咨询活动搞得有声有色。比如，小亚西亚阿素斯和阿塔纽斯的统治者赫尔米亚前来求助，要求帮他组建一个合理的政府，柏拉图就派去了科里斯库和厄拉斯托；马其顿国王佩尔狄卡二世要求学园给他派一名顾问，柏拉图就派去了欧佛莱奥；柏拉图还派欧多克苏和亚里士多德去为他们的母邦斯塔吉拉帮助制定法律。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c40ebf8b-19a0-4950-8483-904f5b59af9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当然，柏拉图并不是有求必应，他总是对提出要求的一方先进行一番道德评价，以避免学园的活动助纣为虐。当时阿卡狄亚人和底比斯人建立美伽洛波利城邦，请柏拉图前去协助立法，可是，柏拉图发现他们的所有权有些问题，他就断然拒绝了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b21db3cd-1f60-411c-9595-6f9b636165da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前367年，叙拉古国王狄奥尼修斯一世去死，其长子狄奥尼修斯二世继位。他只有30岁，没有处理公共事务的经验。柏拉图的好友第昂邀请他前来协助进行政治改革。柏拉图到叙拉古之后，叙拉古宫廷的地板上都铺满了沙砾，人们热中于在那上面研究几何学。狄奥尼修斯二世一开始热情地接待了柏拉图，表现得像一个听话的学生。可是不久，狄奥尼修斯二世很快便把柏拉图和第昂视为潜在的对手。他驱逐了第昂，把柏拉图监禁了一段时间后也驱逐回国。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e751bb5-8282-4808-9a44-efd7071fbb04"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图前往西西里进行的政治活动都是败兴而归，还险些丧命。在以后的日子里，他基本放弃了从事国家实际政务，而把余生的主要时间和精力投入写作。他在学园里著述讲学，前后达40年之久，终身未婚。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc831b58-64da-4d1d-a44a-c3eae0f8b630"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在柏拉图80岁那年，一位年轻的朋友请他参加婚宴，大家饮酒作乐，气氛热烈，柏拉图本不想扫大家的兴，但身体实在承受不了这种希腊式的狂欢，他悄悄地退到了旁边的卧室里，小睡一会。当大家尽情欢乐之后，新郎突然想起老师还在睡觉，就轻手轻脚地走进了卧室，发现柏拉图仍在沉睡，安详神态一如从前。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0aae12f-4ea4-47fc-aaa1-06cb6340acf2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可是，柏拉图这一睡就再也没有醒来，他以这种近乎完美的方式永远地把人世的喧嚣和烦恼抛在了身后。柏拉图去世后，就葬于他倾注了半生心血的柏拉图学园。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5289e2a2-82dc-4924-b79c-53076c366d28"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图的一生历经了雅典的衰落、政府党团与形式的更迭、政治暴动，看见城邦转成帝国，希腊跃进希腊化世界，他曾热切参与政治，但对时势深感绝望。而后从政治抽身，专心哲学，在希腊乃至整个世界享有崇高的声誉。他当时在人们心目中的形象可用他的学生亚里士多德的悼词来佐证：“岿岿胜德，莫之能名。光风霁月，涵育贞明。有诵其文，有瞻其行。乐此盛世，善以缮生”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c2ce5d7-7b11-470d-8f08-4d6ef764be80"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fd47b9ed-9bc6-47a5-8001-32acc65b4a28","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"他们来自柏拉图学园"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"074bdcae-31f8-46f8-ba1d-adf3167f9bc6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f3234b3-7c62-462c-95ff-909a984851a5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图死后，他的侄子斯彪西波继续领导学园，直至公元前339年去世。斯彪西波和第昂的关系密切，也许参加了第昂在西西里的筹备工作。他的众多著作一本也未流传下来，今天的人们只是通过亚里士多德的著作知道他试图用数来代替柏拉图理念的思想。斯彪西波之后，学园的领导是克塞诺格拉底，直至公元前314年；以后是波莱蒙，他死于公元前270年；再以后是克拉特斯主持学园。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c7e86f4-9d33-427d-bda4-f4b4775907c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"值得一提的是本都库斯，他大约在公元前367年进入学园。当柏拉图带着斯彪西波和克塞诺格拉底于公元前361年赴西西里时，他被委托临时来领导学园。斯彪西波死后，他回到了自己的祖国——黑海岸边的赫拉克勒斯，在那里自己创办了一所学校。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db531f41-1911-478d-8197-6fa0a8e8ff08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图死后，一任又一任的后继者带着对柏拉图的虔诚，努力使他的思想发扬光大。不过，他们的工作主要是把已经知道了的东西加以系统化，很少引入新方法。柏拉图学园前后持续了900年之久，这主要是由于柏拉图的个人魅力及其弟子的热忱。直到公元529年，东罗马皇帝查士丁尼认为它是异说中心而下令封闭，柏拉图学园才划上了句号。但是，柏拉图学园培育出来的一大批杰出人物及其卓越贡献在历史上却永放光芒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52379223-48b7-4f33-961a-8632c880e537"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就以柏拉图学园最重视的数学为例，公元前4世纪，几乎所有重要的数学成果都来自柏拉图学园。欧几里德是平面几何学的创始人，早年曾在柏拉图学园攻读数学，为人类留下了不朽的《几何原本》。泰特托斯是立体几何的创始人，他解决了怎样用割圆曲线来化圆为方的问题，还撰写了一本关于五种正立方体的著作，并为无理数详尽分类奠定了基础。欧克多斯是数学天文学的创始人，他提出了关于比例的一个新理论，建立了严谨的穷竭法，并用它证明了一些求积定理。他的学生欧几克斯按照柏拉图建议的方法，构造了一个同心球叠加的天文模型。门奈赫莫斯发现了圆锥曲线的三种形式。这些人除在数学上有所建树，他们同时又是天文学家、哲学家。正如美国数学史家波耶所说：“虽然柏拉图本人在数学研究方面没有特别杰出的学术成果，然而在那个时代他却是数学活动的核心，……，他对数学的满腔热枕没有使他成为知名的数学家，但却赢得了数学家缔造者的美称。”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0883b23-e4d2-47c8-a38f-90b82b897694"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在柏拉图众多弟子当中，最独树一帜、声名显赫的当推“古希腊最博学的人”——亚里士多德。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddca9ebc-6387-4cbd-adfb-1e72a9c2c92e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"亚里士多德公元前384年出生于希腊北部的斯塔吉拉，父亲是马其顿王的御医。17岁进入柏拉图学园学习。10多年的学园生活，使柏拉图和亚里士多德师徒两人产生了笃厚的情意，但这并不能消除他们在哲学最根本问题上的分歧，他们之间曾发生过多次激烈的争辩，尽管亚里士多德在许多方面与老师的观点唱反调，但柏拉图还是认为亚里士多德是最优秀的。由于柏拉图年事已高，想把学园的大权转交给亚里士多德，但附带一个要求：亚里士多德必须修改自己的观点。在学园里，大家也都认为亚里士多德是继承柏拉图衣钵最合适的人选，但亚里士多德自己却并不这样想。如果为了当上学园的继承人而放弃自己的主张，那又怎么能成为一名真正的哲学家呢？哲学家是不会为了眼前的暂时利益而忘却自己天职的。夹在师徒之情和真理之爱间的亚里士多德最终还是作出了离开柏拉图学园的决定。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cacb5745-db9a-4faa-bdcd-36f181955164"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公元前343年，亚里士多德担任了马其顿王子——13岁的亚历山大的私人教师，这位王子后来成为著名的征服者亚历山大大帝。公元前335年，亚里士多德回到雅典，成立了自己的吕克昂学园，创建了著名的“逍遥学派”，其得名是因为他喜欢和学生们一起边散步，边讨论问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bce7e82e-61a8-47d0-b94d-4d7f2e64ae79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与柏拉图喜爱综合研究的风格相比，亚里士多德更像是一位分门别类研究的近代科学家。他的著作涉及力学、物理学、数学、逻辑学、气象学、植物学、动物学、心理学、伦理学、文学、哲学、经济学等广阔的领域，几乎囊括了当时人类的一切学科。柏拉图这样评述他的爱徒：“亚里士多德踢开了我，正如小雄驹踢开生养它的母亲。”而亚里士多德为自己立场的辩护更是被传为佳句：“吾爱吾师，吾更爱真理。”我们或许很难把苏格拉底和柏拉图从思想上分开，但亚里士多德却在继承先师的基础上获得了惊人的独立性，为西方思想的发展和开拓划定了方向。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed12846f-fa3c-44e0-8af4-ec349558ca34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图与他的老师苏格拉底、学生亚里士多德师徒三代的思想在西方被奉为经典。特别是柏拉图关于“哲学王”的讨论——只有当哲学家成为政治家 ，成为一国之君的时候，真正健康的政治生活才会来到——始终在理想与现实张力的推进中，构建起西方政治传统演进的基本框架。"}]}]}
cards.title: 柏拉图学园

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a29e6d55-ad19-412f-987d-765c1a21b5ae","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"哲学概念手册"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4a615a4-1f78-4042-bfd2-44213a5e2f92"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这里主要记录一些哲学的思想概念以及一些哲学史。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0933635c-5caf-4399-9c5c-bee36656dd28"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"089bad36-8049-4534-9048-65e784a5d41c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd670b6f-b8ba-41ec-9a89-627f0ef3a045"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"43f44d25-b14d-42e5-88af-e28c37ebf93e"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"31a4fbed-434c-443e-9def-8d0d76b4ddbf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e3df5a0-b7cf-4351-8cb6-bcf1b8aa4a57"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8ad8ad1d-8b2f-42bf-9d83-91b85ef74fa9"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"42539697-f1d8-43c5-a220-226669a887fb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ec31e84-4967-4123-b771-27f7797b7a29"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"25305640-c951-474a-acf1-fcd2328e2c8e"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b0020151-ea8b-47c2-bede-3712a851be1b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f092aed5-485b-4141-8ebc-7fb500a47228"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7c9281d4-70a4-4586-951d-39ca40cb30ce"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"387a6ef5-ad62-4763-8961-98da9e2210aa","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6dc2c6fc-67dc-4a86-b96d-21388e6f9785"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2f8c177f-77a5-44a1-b04b-d5ca0c3bee76"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"371d416c-0759-4d7f-a6de-68ac46aa06d3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da06842c-067e-445e-b7a2-c51d74532362"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae25ec3f-e516-4b05-a6c4-3a0c294d648a"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4e7382c9-35c9-40b7-86fe-5b9edbcfc35b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a4f571bf-79c7-44a7-b498-3716fc5c8343"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae1b501f-3ef6-4936-b92b-cb9bcd9cb940"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e0a9e7be-a66a-4b1c-8b4f-81344befbc75","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f32c320-8f70-40f6-9be3-fb8357fd5aa8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"641d9378-7a76-457f-be0b-c70dafa133df"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5dd99b55-8b1b-4877-ba25-010dc6510e8f"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4fd182c1-39ac-4bee-ba80-4e6eca39311d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"树莓派折腾手册"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8152f99-c69c-4ae7-9dba-aa152de52f75"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这里整理折腾树莓派时候的一些经验或者笔记。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8b4396f-b121-4f48-a72c-4bb753bb1c0d"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"55def500-a6c0-4600-9d6c-d65af413faee","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17335d04-3b54-4b4c-8b71-c249ac1e3a1e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ead898a-2031-45e4-b1e6-0d513b8fbb0a"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"32458b06-ebcf-4def-8bdb-1d3c47155386","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"173faa57-c029-47b5-a540-d213f1e90cf0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"033479fd-693e-4713-9da8-8554556578be"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49527293-bb76-4545-a4a9-fed852835581","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57fe8b25-fcd2-480c-8799-3d752cb65729"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"db22f0a9-d6ea-4d60-8311-894b72fe09be"}}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8ee9bb29-de15-4129-9f5d-6e53cace001f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让人说话能让这个世界更好吗？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50a12e45-aacd-44aa-8603-0943eafa3727"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让人说话能让这个世界更好吗？如果你前几年问我，我回答一定是偏向正面的。但现在我，回答更倾向于「不确定」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38d73333-32fa-471a-83a8-b63b8e4a508b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9644f324-8e70-4ee2-80a1-af90840e2976"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但不让人说话这个世界会更好吗？我的回答会更肯定。一定也是「不会」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32f7ca01-2880-4a2f-b47f-78d124edf954"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b900a21-c2d8-4d8a-ac69-e113dca4691e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们现如今都在经历着信息爆炸的时代，一个说什么都有一群人支持或者否定的时代。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"260697a2-e07a-44ef-8eb9-bf3098052550"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a447e294-9ed1-4d94-9710-5be8dcf0c885"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们甚至很难从搜索引擎的众多的相关答案里找到最合适的那一个。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b6113a6-9da3-4be8-b070-eb0882ec6af8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bf8c281-f66e-4289-93ed-031b3758acbc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以 AI 应运而生，它不再需要我们在众多的搜索结果里找到那个我们认为「最正确的那一个」。它会猜上下文，给我们它认为神经网络里权重最高的那个。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6394cb02-bf78-4fe7-b1fb-3751976cef7d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e1f4deb-4583-4aad-9041-2ec2398621dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大道至简，我们还是喜欢最简单最省力的产品，毕竟每人每天的注意力和精力都会有限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3d167d0-09b3-4c9a-9326-4ccbb4d25afc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d393728b-ac8f-4fe3-85a8-aaa49d133838"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"话说回来，这几年用户批评我的时刻也很多。我也一度觉得一些人或许是"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b12558a5-7fbf-410a-a1b7-8d963e6a6f83"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d9470d2-8556-45b4-a8d2-ca481cf0b2f6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64c71e68-e951-4880-adb9-38eed33b9f20"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91e163a9-57d2-47ea-a41c-02b6844d50a9"}}]}
cards.title: 让人说话能让这个世界更好吗？

"},{"type":"text","text":"），两个井号表示次级标题（相当于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e7dfd76e-23f2-4c61-977d-8ee4a187d414","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阿斯伯格"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd6740f7-a7c7-4675-9805-a295691dd218"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阿斯伯格综合征（Asperger's Syndrome），也被称为阿斯伯格症候群，是一种神经发育障碍性疾病，属于孤独症谱系障碍（ASD）的一种。它主要表现为社会交往困难、局限且异常的兴趣行为模式，但患者通常没有明显的语言发育障碍和智力障碍。"}]}]}
cards.title: 阿斯伯格

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5676f8d3-f160-4d39-af34-b2ffbb1e67ae","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读书笔记"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68def9ea-8031-4ff1-bf25-23b4842c6f98"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这里会整理记录一直以来读过的书籍的心得体会或者划线书摘，读过的书总是需要整理的，记下来并不一定是你的，但是不记下来一定不是你的。语言的边界就是思维的边界，让书籍中的精确语言重塑我们思维的边界。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f9bba3f-0488-4214-9e0c-a213ac0a7c50"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"75675f2e-5e4e-4327-a755-7c99710a92d4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4af769e7-9643-4d7d-9460-ecc3a8c1bd18"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4dfe0d5c-7644-496f-903f-c3d9b67b2ccb"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7d683802-2cae-43a8-98a5-2e51a8a68424","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bcdff88c-4356-4474-8904-a275813ec9c7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a82c6986-0f3f-49cb-9e23-00b28b8db731"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"daf34b47-4161-4cd9-83a1-acbaeafb9e31","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc9a67de-5715-4f3c-b78f-dbbdc80d1635"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34ca2cd3-753f-4baa-b0dc-7ceb9bdc1ccd"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1501583-2b70-4489-afd5-af722e396ef9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4c1f7b6-5bda-4997-9c28-68fdf8360b8d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e8095574-e2d8-4363-9bd4-c40c386ea0e7"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bb8c2b88-cbe7-49a3-b7c2-54061d2b8043","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f044910d-477e-4399-8212-c6dcb0b2dd9a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7a9c190e-aa5b-409c-9ae1-3b80f7d14417"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ff6ba77-b2d9-4d98-9e01-322972a9a5f4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e26fe8c7-a313-4226-87be-5dbdf0244fe2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"74c2de7b-b0ba-4778-9e3b-85cedf96fa07"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9d20b5b1-dc86-4a7c-a86b-b68618d46688","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b356dce-f57e-45ab-ae73-76f860eb6190"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e2564e54-07c3-4b9b-8043-cbf8999e4d5d"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50dafc1d-4bd8-4e6a-9875-431c6834e437","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73acb57a-9492-43bc-a0e4-66d3afa40ea4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6629d4d6-9540-4df7-a12d-0907ef09c6c2"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"049fe4ef-514a-413a-ac1d-fc44084868e9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"458856d1-5a98-400b-8b17-8769ef2c05a8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d9308ea8-2bc7-4781-a61f-cb7c35711998"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dfad2091-0043-489a-92a6-86031a6cd632","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0813c891-eaf5-4f51-9740-73e9dac3742f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3c260441-fa14-4432-be0c-d508496efc7c"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a2cd4242-6f6d-4bca-ba72-05a77ab732f2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7d723ec-a304-4adc-8f06-1fd8fe309a1f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c3c69072-7db2-424b-9adf-4cabdb0456ee"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"82c6f2cd-4551-4642-acf4-516db1803975","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f4d0626-3f45-4bd3-a966-70a7203d55cb"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"81f28c40-2601-400e-8c2f-a7bd34c13861"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b613c7af-b048-453f-be02-b900f10c125e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"958773d1-df2a-4d55-8c0e-5a946270bded"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"238f1897-9a61-47b7-8864-a7ec658181f1"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c0af9584-1144-49f7-9229-c1e07ddd956d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1eef1cdb-1937-4884-8206-ac1a0548ddec"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d9d60b8b-be17-49c5-afee-15ea9993b42a"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04a03319-2dce-4bcd-bcca-951c2236adb2"}}]}
cards.title: 读书笔记

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"74d41084-106d-4234-8bc1-5c83a76802e6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《乡土中国》"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e9a44097-7e2e-4286-aef4-5a56668c0fb3","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"书摘"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3fc101f6-65d0-48a1-a9d0-4aabe8aaeb81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"土气是因为不流动而发生的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ca90c84-49b7-4024-8418-a65eee1d266f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ba5f62a-1d0c-47e6-9edf-42d49d4b4456"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中国乡土社区的单位是村落。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"349471b4-2dca-4cd2-bf62-e91abf808fc9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef4015a8-46fe-4ff6-9349-22e498ac2c08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会是一个熟人社会，一个没有陌生人的社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa5e32d3-c6b6-43bc-b463-c7d2bea64516"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b31f5c26-f1d9-44fb-9b94-1c78c30451a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个没有具体目的，只因为在一起生长而发生的社会是礼俗社会，为了完成一件任务而结合的社会是法理社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01ea15cb-3491-4a7e-b765-48761b980588"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d4b06ca-36c6-4f8c-8576-e63b87f0e311"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡下人不认识汽车是知识问题不是智力问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0794d9d-f249-41e7-a6bf-235f408299c2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1af350e7-c6fb-4fa3-a242-a93f5e0a0642"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会养成的习惯还在支配着现代中国人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0be3a07d-3ace-494e-942b-cd0c47a77144"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c739de5f-dfa2-4258-97db-a37286b2cf2d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言造就了人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"782879c3-1624-4efb-9298-8f01b543550d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6aea64a0-5b34-423b-bb8e-0427a2136dc0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会大体上是没有文字的社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44d5dad7-6f9a-4d10-af7b-9175481ef54e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c73e69db-22f3-4800-976c-34a61c9c0343"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学的方法是”习”，习指的是反复的做，靠时间中的磨炼使一个人惯于一种新的作法，因之，学习必须打破个人今昔之隔。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"05528183-f4bc-4e02-be62-2596310e5883"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbba0475-4a04-4084-ae71-962fdb2ebcf4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在西方社会里争的是权利，在乡土社会里攀的是关系，讲的是交情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bfd0a85b-65b8-46e9-895b-fd48f024a189"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0ef9d23-108c-4490-9882-4aa291db416c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"儒家最考究人伦，伦是什么？是从自己推出去和自己发生社会关系的那一群人里所发生的一轮轮波纹的差序。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52251eae-5e08-40de-bb53-3aefe37a13bc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d896f64e-3018-48a0-bb89-1dc35e183959"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在这种富于伸缩的网络里，随时随地是有一个”己”作中心的，这并不是个人主义，而是自我主义。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b2b67a2-8335-4d02-8b34-16c017401b16"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9ecd311-dc4c-4884-a4cc-e3a1083d2785"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会是一根私人关系所构成的网络。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1aa73556-02a4-4d46-8031-f3fa2f06d16a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7af21f1b-37b7-4fea-aa5c-47ffac3fe412"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从社会的观点来说，道德是社会对人行为的制裁力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12eed878-7b5d-4316-9b77-a80e384d6baf"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bccdda58-95da-40be-8d83-08a6a76adaeb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从社会关系中说，感情是有破坏作用的。感情的淡漠是稳定社会关系的一种表示，纪律是排斥私情的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"701cb9ca-e35d-4010-8454-d7de4bfcceb9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6326e99b-c79e-49c1-ba7d-dc4a7cd831da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"稳定社会的力量不是感情，而是了解。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4700831-fb9d-412c-83de-3a9011fe38b3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b29c6580-1803-469e-88f5-b45d3718e5b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会是一个男女有别的社会，也是个安稳的社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5809ade2-71f1-47a2-8214-0e507d71a583"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7df74cc6-89e5-4a34-958c-b741291999c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"法治的意思是社会人和人的关系是根据法律来维持。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4e05a6d-60a8-4607-b3ea-dd6a9322f9f3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"725fd52a-e0be-467e-83c6-8d9ee2881428"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人治和法治的区别，不在人和法两个字上，而是在维持秩序时所用的力量上。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"139fe047-ad5f-410d-94e3-e5d53e6d15ed"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"962e0020-c512-4dd9-a26e-1d57cf454dbb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会是”礼治”的社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbbf69f6-fabf-48ad-85ef-27df36a7a5cd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"76e95ee9-592f-4780-8f6d-70b02cc23190"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"礼和法是不同的维持规范的两种力量，法律靠国家的权力推行，而礼不需要有形的权力来维持，礼的维持是靠传统。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68fc2ade-dcb7-4a0a-aef4-1e1ba0504987"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c1c5f37-d1ec-469a-9807-0fa942650d92"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会是安土重迁的社会，是生于斯，长于斯，死于斯的社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8eaf8333-a563-4c2d-84dd-67d3f564d0fd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c7fa18c-ae51-4cfb-a680-885fae2d8774"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社会分工的结果是每个人都不能”不求人”而生活。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46bd781a-9256-4dd7-a164-0e0cde2849fe"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5b56595-d83d-49ec-8522-a2d51a3c1b51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们喜欢从权力得到利益。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48337b03-ad94-417d-90c2-3b79fa92fbb7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"029e9869-14fe-46e7-ae8e-19d692a9d2ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个只是生产他生存必须的消费品的人是没有资格做奴隶的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"918f5395-2227-46de-b6c4-b7f4a54c4465"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"034cb13e-8e3e-4e38-bd50-c5f2acae9811"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"乡土社会没有政治，只有教化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a649df98-5548-4e60-b528-fa7a72c250f7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5af7ffc2-28b2-4bde-a98c-7e7d9809bc35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在变迁社会中，习惯是适应的阻碍，经验等于顽固和落伍。"}]},{"type":
